commit.message:
crtstuff.c (CRT_CALL_STATIC_FUNCTION): Define default.

* crtstuff.c (CRT_CALL_STATIC_FUNCTION): Define default.
(fini_dummy, init_dummy): Use it.

From-SVN: r35971

files.patch:
